Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory713.jpg'}
{3: 'Every member of the Church of Machina has their own dedicated room.'}

{3: "For example, Haicma's room is relatively simple, yet filled with all kinds of manga books. On the other hand, Cervantes' room is cluttered with a plethora of art tools, which are covered in dust due to the long absence of their owner."}
{3: 'However, among all the members, Zavier has the biggest room...'}

{3: 'Under the vast ten-meter-high ceiling, countless shelves stand in line, accompanied by an array of machines and laboratory equipment designed for every facet of production, processing, and maintenance.'}
{3: 'Of course, technically this space should be considered a shared lab of the Church. However, from the very beginning, Zavier has been the only one willing to spend every day here.'}
{3: '"Zavier\'s magic workshop!"'}
{3: "That was Nanami's comment on this room, and in response, Zavier even ordered a sign to hang on the door."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Good morning.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: "Cervantes? Your painting board, the one you wanted a scanner added to, is all set. It's over there. Grab it yourself.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Thanks. Are you... reading?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: "Geng-3-6 instruction set: By the end of Xuhai Gate, all the compilation structures are seen as... Are you following this? It feels like I'm reading an alien language.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: "Sorry, I don't know much about it either...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: "For all the places you've been to, shame on you!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: "Traveling there doesn't mean I have to understand its language and technologies.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: "Fine, I'll figure it out myself...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'A General Introduction to the Art of Kowloong Programming? Why are you reading this?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'It could be useful one day. Moreover...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: '...You mean "her"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: "Yeah. She's been here since the Church was established.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: "To some degree, she's indeed a witness to the tumultuous ebb and flow the Church has experienced.", 4: '1'}
{3: "A mechanoid storage pod is positioned at the loftiest point in Zavier's workshop. She wasn't always set in such an elevated, inaccessible location."}
{3: 'However, after countless unsuccessful attempts, the Church was left with no choice but to let her continue her slumber.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: "I've been picking up some subtle self-check signals since Sage met her. I'm thinking that she may wake up herself one day.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Do you know that the look on your face is like...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'Like what?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Like a doctor, filled with a mix of frustration, curiosity, and excitement, who faces an unconscious patient afflicted with a rare disease.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: "No one has ever described my facial expression that way. I'll keep a note of it.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'But has she... "talked" like this before?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: "It's the storage pod at the highest place, right? Listen carefully.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: "This is the first time we've detected such an activity signal, and the coding system is compatible with ours!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'This should be... her voice.', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: "Ladder... move the ladder over! I need to check the indexes... Power it up, quickly! Wait, don't touch anything! I'll handle this, you go find someone to help move her down.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Okay.', 4: '1'}
{1: '>>>>> Voice recording ends <<<<<', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: '>>>>> Instruction Xin-5-5 to Ren-0-7 missing. Skip? <<<<<', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: '>>>>> Skip missing instructions... Loading visual module <<<<<', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 9: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: 'Hi? Bonjour? Em... Ni Hao? Can you hear me?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With his mechanical arm, Zavier gently pats the translucent glass pod, long blanketed in a thick layer of dust.'}
{3: 'Yet the mechanoid in the pod can only make a futile attempt to open her mouth, as if she has forgotten how to speak and cannot produce any sound.'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: "The language system hasn't been fully activated? Let me see... How about this?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: "I'm linking your memory shell signal to our self-compiling system. This way, we can communicate without needing a language or sound system... Give it another try?", 4: '1'}
{3: '"...Yoyo... Who are you? Where am I..."'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: "Good! Awesome! Sage did awaken you! My name's Zavier, and we're at the Church of Machina.", 4: '1'}
{3: '"What\'s... the Church of Machina? Is this another dream?"'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'Dream? Hmm, is the environmental perception not completed yet? I need to give some parameters another tweak.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: "Huh? My name is not Yoyo. I'm Zavier. Why do I feel something's off with the cognitive module as well...?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trailblazer', 3: 'Hey, Zavier, what are you doing up there?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The already cluttered workshop becomes even more crowded with the sudden arrival of several mechanoids. Cervantes is forced to compact himself to make room for the bulky "Death" and "Chariot".'}
{3: 'Compared to the bulk of Trailblazer and Spooner, Cervantes boasts a much more slender body.'}
{3: 'Meanwhile, inside the workshop, Zavier is up on an almost eight-meter-high ladder, carefully inspecting the topmost level of the shelf.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'I could only find Spooner and Blaze, so I asked them to accompany me. Arcana is on the way here and should arrive shortly. Zero and "Emperor" are currently not in the Church.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trailblazer', 3: "Zavier, it's getting too cramped in here. Can we talk in the hall?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Ahem... my hat. Blaze, could you tuck your rear wings in?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trailblazer', 3: 'Sorry, Cervantes.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Cervantes retrieves his hat, which was knocked off by Trailblazer, and firmly presses it back onto his head to prevent it from being dislodged again.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Spooner', 3: "I heard from Cervantes that a new member woke up? Oh, sorry, Zavier, I didn't mean to do that...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Conscious of the limited space, Spooner tries to reposition himself at a more accommodating angle. However, the sound of a device shattering underfoot interrupts his maneuver.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: 'Forget about it. You two arrived just in time. Come and give me a hand.', 4: '2'}

{3: 'Zavier slides down the ladder to the ground, pushing aside the piled-up devices to make room for the storage pod. He then gestures toward the highest shelf level, indicating for the two to head over there.'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: "Bring that down. All my maintenance tools are on the floor, and I can't get them up there. I need to do another check on her.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cervantes', 3: "Right here? I'm not sure we'll have enough space if we bring that down.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: 'It should be just enough, I think?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'Is she... the member who Gear brought back a long time ago?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: "That's right. Thanks to the Revelation of Sage, she finally woke up, and of course, thanks to myâ€”", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trailblazer', 3: 'A new member?!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Trailblazer suddenly raises his voice and leaps into the air with excitement, floating next to the shelf.'}
{3: "And as an expected result, the gust of air from his engine once again sends Cervantes' hat tumbling to the ground."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'My, why did you get so worked up...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trailblazer', 3: "Of course I would get worked up! Just think about it, how long has it been since we last had a new member join us? It's a great thing worth celebrating!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: "Hey! Be careful! That's made of glass! Spooner, hurry up and help him. Blaze isn't cut out for delicate work!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'Then... sorry about this.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Despite Spooner's best efforts to tread carefully, the sound of shattering devices still echoes around the room with each step he takes toward the shelf."}
{3: 'Yet, to Zavier, these appear to be trivial matters unworthy of his attention, as he seems to be just as excited as Trailblazer.'}
{3: 'Spooner leans against the ladder, providing solid support from beneath the pod, while Trailblazer, floating in the air, carefully lifts the pod from above, lowering it step by step.'}
{3: 'As the dull thud of the glass pod touching down on the ground continues to resonate in the room, Zavier eagerly wipes the small window with a towel.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trailblazer', 3: 'Human!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cervantes', 3: "Don't talk nonsense, Blaze.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'This outfit... Kowloong?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: "You've been to Kowloong?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "...No, I haven't. I've just heard some stories about that place.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: 'Hey, hey! Can you see us?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Zavier waves his hand toward her, and through the hazy glass, he sees her eyes and lips quiver, yet no sound comes from her.'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'It seems the visual module is working fine. The vocal module... is still loading?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'For a Kowloong product like this, I might need to do some further tweaking on its interface protocol to enhance compatibility.', 4: '1'}

{3: 'Zavier pulls a few cables from the countless piles scattered on the floor, connecting them to the pod. He then walks away, heading toward the shelves at the back, muttering something under his breath.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trailblazer', 3: 'Hey, Zavier.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'I need to find something! I remember that Gear brought some replacement parts with her.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trailblazer', 3: 'About this lady... Why have I never heard of her?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Zavier should have mentioned to you about a comrade who has been unable to wake up.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trailblazer', 3: 'Huh? Has he?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cervantes', 3: "You have to stop drinking engine oil, or you'll lose all your memory data.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Spooner', 3: "I didn't learn about her from Zavier but from Arcana and Sage.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'A few days ago, when Sage returned for resupply, both Arcana and Sage approached Zavier. They were discussing something about Sage checking on a comrade who had been asleep for a long time, and I just happened to be passing by that day.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: "She's one of the first comrades that Gear brought back, but despite all our attempts, we couldn't wake her up.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Having said that, Cervantes shifts his gaze away from the storage pod on the ground and lets out a quiet sigh.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Arcana', 3: 'Good work, everyone.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: 'Zavier, you did well.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'When Zavier emerges from the depths of the shelves, he carries a large wooden crate in his hands. At the same time, Arcana walks into the workshop and approaches Hanying.'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: "Thanks to Sage's guidance, you have finally awakened.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: 'Time... has not managed to dust her soul.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Arcana gently places her hand on the pod, her gaze focused on the figure within, seemingly oblivious to the dust that dances in the air around her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: 'The indices are improving, and the vocal module has also completed loading.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: "I'm going to open the pod, alright?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Spooner', 3: 'Do we need to move away?', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Zavier', 3: "Absolutely not! Do you think this is some retro sci-fi flick where mist comes pouring out the moment the hatch pops open? Please, we've been using high-tech protective gases since, like, forever...", 4: '2'}
{3: "Zavier suddenly adopts an overly dramatic expression, then, with a thrill that exceeds anyone else's, he eagerly presses the button."}
{3: 'As the glass hatch gradually opens, her suspended time begins to flow once more.'}
{3: 'She finds herself surrounded by mechanoids of various shapes and forms, a spectacle that would never be witnessed on the Nighter.'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: 'Welcome.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Arcana's smile is as warm as ever, radiating a heartfelt welcome to the awakening comrade."}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: 'May I know your name?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: '"Then that will be your name, Miss! It belongs to you and no one else."'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory713.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Hanying... My name is Hanying.', 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Abundantly, the millet flourishes, sprouting grains anew. I tread softly, distancing, my heart begins to sigh.'}
{3: 'Those who perceive me, yield a sorrowful decree; the ones oblivious, query what it is I seek.'}
{3: 'O heavens, so vast and high peak, who shall be responsible for this?'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory248.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory248.png'}

{3: "The street lamp projects a silhouette onto the bench, and the owner of this shadow casts a longing gaze upon the river ahead. The flowing water, in turn, ushers the depths of the night downstream, far beyond the city's confines."}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "What's the time?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bai Gui', 3: "It's just after twelve o'clock."}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Okay, tell me about it.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her gaze stays unbroken, as though she were talking with the river itself.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bai Gui', 3: 'The medic outside has reported that the condition of that Fuxi member, the one you instructed him to attend to earlier, is unfortunately not very promising.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bai Gui', 3: "He's concerned about things getting rushed and potentially incurring your disapproval, so he opts to relay the message ahead of time.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Bai Gui, do you know what is this place?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The completely unrelated question catches Bai Gui off guard.'}

{2: 'Bai Gui', 3: "Um... I've heard about it from the Suanni scholars. This place is the birthplace of the city of Kowloong. From here, Kowloong was built, piece by piece, extending all the way to the ocean along the river.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Unsure of Qu's intentions, Bai Gui still responds to her question, maintaining a respectful posture with his head bowed."}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "The Suanni scholars? Tsk, only the Heavens know how many times they've perused the mounting pile of records and journals in the archive.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'For the erudite, delving into history is an obligatory path, while inscribing history is their glorified noble calling.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'They only know to grasp tightly at history, but refuse to lift their gaze even once, like fish living in the stagnant waters of historical records.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Yet, this ancient river had already carved its path through this land before Kowloong was even named Kowloong. Nothing can alter it, not Kowloong, not even the Punishing Virus.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Rising from the bench, Qu falls into a quiet contemplation as she faces the river.'}
{3: 'It is only now that Bai Gui notices several aged antique books on the bench where Qu was sitting.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Have you handled everything up there?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'I want to go there and take a look. Is that one still alive?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bai Gui', 3: "Yes, that's for sure, but... I see. I'll go get things ready.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Suppressing the doubt in his heart, Bai Gui complies with Qu's request. His figure soon vanishes into the Kowloong night, accompanied by a light blue wave of air."}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'In light or in shade, judge or commend... I must pursue my mission till the end.'}
{3: 'The lingering voice of the green figure dissipates with the river breeze. The pages of a book, seemingly immune to the wind, turn over to reveal a new chapter.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory180.png'}
{3: 'One step, two steps, from losing balance to regaining balance.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The ruler of Kowloong is not permitted to lose her composure, yet every sense, every receptor within her was echoing loudly, transmitting a signal labeled "real" to her M.I.N.D.'}
{3: "Everything can't be more familiar, yet every time she returns here, she feels as though she's losing control of her own body."}
{3: 'The same goes for the city.'}
{3: 'Following that battle, all members of the Kowloong Crew retreated back to the Observatory within Kowloong, severing nearly all connections with the outside world.'}

{3: 'The remaining Kowloong Crew members who are still stationed in the city and have yet to enter Tabula Akasha consist of a few Fuxi members responsible for maintenance and a handful of medics. In total, their number is just a few dozen.'}
{3: 'For them, Kowloong and Tabula Akasha mean everything in their life.'}
{3: 'Heng Ji, who has been awaiting Qu at the encampment, makes a move to greet her upon her arrival, but is quickly halted.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "There's no need.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Heng Ji straightens his slightly hunched back, attempting to conceal the signs of his aging posture.'}
{3: 'Aging, an inevitable fate that every Kowloong Crew member stationed within the city must eventually face.'}

{3: 'Even though the Fuxi Crew have adapted mainstream Construct technology from the outside world after the battle of Kowloong, their age and physical condition are no longer conducive to any Construct reconstruction.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'When the appropriate time comes, you should prioritize backing up your data as soon as possible.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Heng Ji', 3: "I updated my data backup last month, but it hasn't been uploaded to Tabula Akasha yet.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Heng Ji', 3: "I've been considering backing up everyone's data here and uploading them all together.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Time's running out. Be quick.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Heng Ji', 3: 'By the way, after Bai Gui delivered the message, Cang Zhu requested a private meeting with you.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory234.png'}
{3: 'Qu pushes open the door, which wasn\'t fully closed to begin with, and finds the Fuxi member known as "Cang Zhu" quietly lying in bed.'}
{2: 'Cang Zhu', 3: 'Still alive, but I only have a few days left.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cang Zhu', 3: "It's likely due to multiple organ failure. They should have a detailed diagnosis.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cang Zhu', 3: "Knowing that my death is imminent is enough for me. I don't wish to delve into the specifics of how I will die.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'You still have the choice not to die.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cang Zhu', 3: 'Tabula Akasha? Ha...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'His throat rattles as he forces out a dry chuckle.'}
{2: 'Cang Zhu', 3: "Death is death. I have no desire to resist it and become some cyber ghost. I've lived long enough.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: '...This is your choice, but still, my promise will always stand.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cang Zhu', 3: "Ah, speaking of promises... If it wasn't for the promise you made, perhaps I wouldn't have lived long enough to even have this choice.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Let the past be the past, Cang Zhu.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cang Zhu', 3: 'Don\'t call me "Cang Zhu".', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cang Zhu', 3: 'My name is always Richard.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'You still consider yourself a member of "The Cradle" to this day?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Richard', 3: 'Perhaps on the day when Villier destroyed the organization, "The Cradle" had already died. But the real "Cradle" that lives in my heart has never ceased to exist.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Richard', 3: 'The pursuit of freedom in technology and information and the creation of a new world have always remained constant in my mind. So, for me, it is the real "Cradle".', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'But not everyone in that organization shares the same beliefs as you do.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'That\'s why "The Cradle" was corrupted by Yin and became involved in the assassination attempt against us.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Richard', 3: 'Yes... Perhaps the code that invaded the Musashi at that time also contained a piece of mine that was left in "The Cradle".', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'You were taken in by Villier before that.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Richard, your dream died the moment you joined the Chaofeng Crew and later became a member of Fuxi.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Richard', 3: "Ha, you're right.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Richard', 3: 'If I were the person I was at the very beginning, I would have never allowed you to take me in.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Richard', 3: 'Nor would I have delivered the message about that revenge to the Nighter.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Richard', 3: "Even though I'm working for KCC nowadays, I'm still acting based on my own visions and beliefs.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Richard', 3: 'Villier indeed destroyed our organization, and for this, he shall brace himself for the price of retribution.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Richard', 3: 'All I did was... offer a gentle warning, but their eyes were blinded by hatred. Failure was inevitable.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Richard', 3: 'So, what now? You want to execute me for treason?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The old Fuxi member taunts Qu with a mocking tone, as if he were still the youthful man he was decades ago.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "That's the Bian Crew's job.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "I don't think they would agree to give a death sentence to someone who is on the verge of dying.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Richard', 3: "A death sentence is actually not bad, don't you think? Better than dying this way, at least.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Having said that, Richard retrieves a terminal from the cabinet beside him and hands it to Qu.'}
{2: 'Richard', 3: 'Everything about The Cradle is stored here, past and present.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Richard', 3: 'Including that assassination targeting Villier on the Nighter, as well as the whereabouts of those involved.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Should I doubt its authenticity?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Richard', 3: 'You should doubt its exclusiveness.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "You should be glad that Bian didn't come with me.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Richard', 3: "Like I said before, I don't fear death.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Richard', 3: "Everything I once loved has vanished with the passage of time. There's nothing left for me to fear now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Richard', 3: "After these many years, I've only realized one thing:", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Richard', 3: 'Time channels all possibilities toward the same endpoint, although some prefer to attribute this to fate.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Richard', 3: "Everyone has their own endpoint... It's all the same.", 4: '1'}
